sentence: there are two boys and a girl , they are in a classroom.
all three have their hands raised.
the first boy is smiling and the other two are not.
the first boy has papers on his desk and a pencil in his hand.
he is waving his hand and shaking his chair.
the other kids are looking at the boy in green.
the boy in green is looking back at the boy.
the boy in green is smiling.
